name: CIRCUIT (Prof!)
description:
CIRCUIT is an in-development puzzle game where you rotate panels on a grid to connect one corner to another of the same color.

Please send feedback here on itch.io or here on this Google Form: https://forms.gle/VNjS7EGaQVCGkkx99 

FEATURING:
-Special Panels!
1. Loop Panel (Pink): Can only be turned in the direction of the arrow. A minor inconvenience on their own that can quickly become paralyzing as you race against the clock.

2. Lock Panel (Purple): Cannot be turned at all. Too many can prove paralyzing, but clearing them will score you extra points!

3. Bomb Panel (Red): Can only be turned a certain amount of times before exploding. Don't let them blow up or your score will drop!

4. Gold Panels (Gold): A blessing and a curse, these reinforced panels stick around for multiple connections! 

- Chain Combos!
Can you think fast? Watch your score skyrocket from clearing panels in rapid succession!

-Charge Meter
Power up your board with special effects! Each charge meter is filled when you connect conduits of its color. When filled, they supply you with strong effects!
1. POSITIVE CHARGE - SHORT CIRCUIT (RED): Free your board by blasting off all Locks!
2. NEGATIVE CHARGE - OVERCLOCK (BLUE): Enter a state of focus where time slows down and the cooldown for completed connections speed up! This effects will also double your current Chain multiplier, making it great for chaining clears.

-Endless Mode!
Shoot for the high score! Clear panels to Level Up before time runs out! Upon each level, you're rewarded with some time, but the score target grows as well!

Controls:

WASD - Move Cursor

J - Turn Piece Left (CCW)

K - Turn Piece Right (CW)

L - Hold Piece (Cannot Hold Special Panels)

P - Pause Game
